chapters.summary: Our society, a capitalistic society, has plenty of choice. Everyone's needs, goals, desires, interests are different. The question is, which one actually makes sense? And do you even need the insurance?
chapters.headline: Freedom means more choice, and more choice is typically a good thing

chapters.summary: Jerry is our insurance specialist, Jerry Clark. We're going to ask some different questions about the different types of permanent life insurance. The question, of course, is which one makes sense, if any at all?
chapters.headline: Jerry Clark will discuss the different types of permanent life insurance
chapters.gist: Different Types of Permanent Life Insurance

chapters.summary: Index universal life is a general account asset product. It's attached to the S&P 500 index. The performance will mirror what that index does within that floor in that cap. Make sure you check and see what guarantees are associated with it.
chapters.headline: Michael McKelvey discusses the indexed universal life policy

chapters.summary: The differences between Variable Universal Life and Indexed Universal Life. Variable Life is separately indexed accounts, meaning that they're not the general account liability. You also have theoretically more upside depending on how the investment performs.
chapters.headline: Walk us through the differences between Variable Universal Life and Indexed Universal Life
chapters.gist: Index Universal Life vs Variable Life: What's The Difference?

chapters.summary: Help us understand the Whole Life Policy, which is, I would say, the flagship product of the permanent life insurance world. It's typically going to give you less upside in comparison to a VUL or an iul. Gotta understand there's no flexibility here as far as premiums go.
chapters.headline: Help us understand the Whole Life Policy, which is the flagship permanent life insurance product

chapters.summary: When does it make sense to consider permanent life insurance versus term? What are the benefits to a permanent policy versus just buying term and let's say investing the Difference?
chapters.headline: When should someone consider permanent life insurance versus term insurance
chapters.gist: Permanent Life Insurance vs Term Life Insurance

podcast_title: Your Life Simplified: A Financial & Wealth Management Podcast
